description: image of three trees planted in a row; left tree has four separate segments that are conical and recede in size toward the top; center tree is a single cone shape; tree on the right has spiraling foliage winding around the trunk; each tree is planted in a mound of grass
inscription: URC, in pencil: The Three Orders of Italian Trees
provenance: The artist; by descent to Thea Tenenbaum-Malferrari, Longmont, Colo.; given to MIA, 2017
signed: LLC, in black ink: Dudley Huppler
title: Three Orders of Italian Trees
